name: Alcohol and Drug Prevention
short_desc: A community-focused program that aims to reduce and prevent alcohol and other drug problems using primary prevention strategies
description: A community-focused program that aims to reduce and prevent alcohol and other drug (AOD) problems using primary prevention strategies. The objectives of the program are to influence public policy, social norms and legislation; change organizational practices; create and nuture coalitions and networks; and educate and organize service providers, community groups and public agencies.
